message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your perspective, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $9000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $11000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $10200. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10800. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $10800. I'm thinking more along the lines of $10500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $10400. That's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $10400. I'm thinking more along the lines of $10300. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
